PREFIX.description: paste your bot prefix note! Don't apply null prefix.

MODE.description: select your bot work type public-private-inbox-group.

AUTO_VOICE.description: Make it true if you want bot auto voice.

AUTO_REPLY.description: Make it true if you want bot auto reply.

AUTO_STICKER.description: Make it true if you want bot auto sticker.

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Make it true if you want bot auto auto_read_status.

ANTI_LINK.description: Make it true if you want bot auto remove group link.

ANTI_BAD.description: Make it true if you want bot auto delete bad words from group example xxx porn etc.

FAKE_RECORDING.description: Make it true if you want bot fake record.

AUTO_REACT.description: Make it true if you want bot AutoReact.

OWNER_REACT.description: Make it true if you want bot OwnerReact.

HEART_REACT.description: Make it true if you want bot only heart â™¥ï¸ emjois reaction .
